definition: race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: The first regional demarcations followed roughly the settlement patterns of various ethnic immigrant groups.
sentences.chinese: 最初的区域界限大体沿循各族裔移民群体的定居模式。

sentences.english: Can Americans choose how and when to use ethnic heritage in describing themselves?
sentences.chinese: 美国人能够选择怎样及何时使用族裔归属自我定位吗？

sentences.english: But the virtue of xenophobia is never really extinguished in any multiethnic body politic.
sentences.chinese: 但是仇外的意识从未真正在任何多族裔政体中被清除。

sentences.english: I ask the Minister of Ethnic Affairs Pansy Wong to stand up for the ethnic communities.
sentences.chinese: 请少数民族事务部黄部长为少数族裔利益挺身而出。

sentences.english: Mr Trump can barely finish a sentence without offending some ethnic group.
sentences.chinese: 而特朗普几乎没有哪句话是不冒犯某个少数族裔的。

sentences.english: the absence of women and minorities in the halls of power.
sentences.chinese: 女性和少数族裔在政治中根本难觅其踪。

sentences.english: One important resource coming from minority groups is young people.
sentences.chinese: 少数族裔带来的一个重要资源是年轻人。

sentences.english: For ethnics who want to add their culture to the mosaic that is America.
sentences.chinese: 为想把自己的文化添入美国万花筒的少数族裔说话。
